Gudang Mitra

Inventory Management System

Welcome to Gudang Mitra

Gudang Mitra is a modern inventory management system designed to help organizations track and manage their inventory requests and stock levels.

This is a placeholder page for the Gudang Mitra application. The full application is being deployed to Vercel with Supabase as the database.

View on GitHub

Key Features

User Authentication

Secure login and registration with role-based access control (user, admin, manager).

Inventory Requests

Create and manage inventory requests with approval workflow.

Stock Management

Track inventory levels and manage stock efficiently.

User Management

Manage system users and their permissions.

Notifications

Real-time notifications for inventory requests and approvals.

Responsive Design

Works on desktop, tablet, and mobile devices.
